shortDescription: editor/filemanager/upload/php/upload.php in FCKeditor before 2.3 Beta, when the upload feature is enabled, does not verify the Type parameter, which allows remote attackers to upload arbitrary file types.  NOTE: It is not clear whether this is related to CVE-2006-0658.
vulnerabilityName: FCKeditor before 2.3 Beta editor/filemanager/upload/php/upload.php Arbitrary File Upload
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
